name: Monsters Clasp - Swap and Match Three Puzzle Game
name_original: Monsters Clasp - Swap and Match Three Puzzle Game
description:
Monsters Clasp is a puzzle match 3 and more to catch the monsters. Fun and easy puzzle game
but challenging you need to choose your move carefully.
all you have to do is to swap and match the monsters by color.

Enjoy multi player mode real-time with split screen challenge your friends Game center, or near you.

Please note: Monster Clasp is totally free game to play, but some in game items “Power Ups, Hints, Tokens, More Back Grounds, Unlock Full version” will required payments.

Monster Clasp features:

•Easy fun and Simple to play, but don’t underestimate the Monsters.
•Enjoy playing with retina graphics.
•Play Multi Levels.
•Endless Play non-stop.
•Multi Player Mode “Game Center” With Split screen real time Multi Player game
•Next-Peer Multiplayer.
•Combine, link 5 and get a Blast, Crush, Chain help you to swap multiple Monsters
•POP up Ninja tap him to know what is hidden.
•And much more …………….

Thank you for DOWNLOADING the game, am sure you will enjoy it, and if you did :)
Don’t forget to rate 5 stars…. Thank you
